body_html:
A few more things I've observed

-Apparently, setting the batch_size to None will cause this error: Cannot convert a partially known TensorShape to a Tensor: (?, 0). Seems that the batch size has to be known before the inputs are fed into the grid lstm.
-There is no problem in setting time_steps to None.
body_text:
A few more things I've observed
-Apparently, setting the batch_size to None will cause this error: Cannot convert a partially known TensorShape to a Tensor: (?, 0). Seems that the batch size has to be known before the inputs are fed into the grid lstm.
-There is no problem in setting time_steps to None.
body:
A few more things I've observed

-Apparently, setting the `batch_size` to `None` will cause this error: `Cannot convert a partially known TensorShape to a Tensor: (?, 0)`. Seems that the batch size has to be known before the inputs are fed into the grid lstm.
-There is no problem in setting `time_steps` to None.
